"use strict";(()=>{var f=()=>{document.querySelector(".section_faq")&&document.querySelectorAll(".cl-i_faq").forEach(o=>{let e=o.querySelectorAll(".cl-i_faq-svg");e.forEach(n=>{n.classList.add("hide")});let s=Math.floor(Math.random()*e.length);e[s].classList.remove("hide")})};var h=()=>{if(document.querySelector(".input-wrapper.is-dropdown")){let t=document.querySelectorAll(".input-wrapper.is-dropdown");t.forEach(o=>{o.addEventListener("click",function(){t.forEach(e=>{e.classList.remove("z-index-4")}),o.classList.add("z-index-4")})})}};var g=()=>{let c=document.querySelector(".input.is-dropdown"),t=document.querySelectorAll(".is-sign"),o=document.querySelector(".section_contact-us form"),e=document.querySelectorAll("form");if(e.length&&e.forEach(n=>{n.addEventListener("submit",function(){n.parentNode.querySelector("[form-success-message]").classList.remove("hide"),n.classList.add("hide")})}),o){let r=function(){let l=Array.from(n).filter(u=>u.checked);l.length>0&&!i.checked&&i&&i.click(),l.length===0&&i.checked&&i&&i.click()};var s=r;let n=document.querySelectorAll(".is-product-list .dropdotwn-options input"),i=document.querySelector(".product-checker");n.forEach(l=>{l.addEventListener("change",r)})}if(t.length&&t.forEach(n=>{n.addEventListener("click",function(){n.previousElementSibling.click()})}),c&&(document.querySelectorAll(".input.is-dropdown").forEach(r=>{let l=r.querySelector("[option-placeholder-value]");l.setAttribute("option-placeholder-value",l.textContent);let u=r.querySelectorAll(".checkbox-wrapper input");u.forEach(d=>{d.addEventListener("change",function(){let p=new Array;u.forEach(m=>{m.checked&&p.push(m.value)});let a=p.toString();a=a.replace(/,(\S)/g,", $1"),a!=""?l.textContent=a:l.textContent=l.getAttribute("option-placeholder-value")})})}),document.querySelectorAll(".is-dropdown .checkbox-wrapper").forEach(r=>{r.addEventListener("click",function(l){r.querySelector(".checkbox-icon").click()})}),window.location.hash)){let r=window.location.hash;r=r.slice(1),document.querySelector('.is-main-form [value="'+r+'"]').click()}};var S=()=>{if(document.querySelector(".section_menu")){let t=document.querySelectorAll(".menu_nav-item"),o=document.querySelectorAll(".section_menu .dropdown-toggle"),e=new MutationObserver(n=>{n.forEach(i=>{t.forEach(r=>{r.classList.add("menu-disabled");let l=document.querySelectorAll(".section_menu .w--open");l.length>0?l.forEach(u=>{u.closest(".menu_nav-item").classList.remove("menu-disabled")}):t.forEach(u=>{u.classList.remove("menu-disabled")})})})}),s={attributes:!0,childList:!0,subtree:!0};o.forEach(n=>{e.observe(n,s)})}};var y=()=>{document.querySelector(".nested-src")&&(document.querySelectorAll('[fs-cmsnest-element="slugs"]').forEach(e=>{let s=e.textContent;if(s!=""){let n=e.parentNode;s.split(",").forEach(r=>{r=r.replace(/\s+/g,"");let l=document.querySelector('[nest-by-name-item="'+r+'"]');if(l){let u=l.cloneNode(!0);n.appendChild(u)}})}}),document.querySelectorAll(".clw_section_solutions-content .case-study-link div").forEach(e=>{let s=e.getAttribute("href"),i=e.closest("[current-client-type-slug]").getAttribute("current-client-type-slug"),r=document.createElement("a");Array.from(e.attributes).forEach(l=>{r.setAttribute(l.name,l.value)}),r.innerHTML=e.innerHTML,r.setAttribute("href",s.replace(/\*/g,i)),e.parentNode.replaceChild(r,e)}))};var w=()=>{document.querySelector(".clw_news.is-news-page")&&setInterval(function(){document.querySelectorAll(".cl-i_news").forEach(o=>{if(o.classList.contains("tags-ready")===!1){let e=o.querySelectorAll(".news_card-header"),s=e[0],n=e[1].querySelector(".news_card-category-wrapper-parent").cloneNode(!0);n.querySelectorAll(".news_card-category-wrapper").forEach(r=>{r.classList.add("is-no-cover"),r.querySelector(".ui-s").classList.add("is-no-cover")}),s.appendChild(n),o.classList.add("tags-ready")}})},700)};var q=()=>{if(document.querySelector("[trigger-popup-slug]")){let t=document.querySelectorAll("[trigger-popup-slug]");document.querySelectorAll(".button.is-visionary-team").forEach(e=>{e.addEventListener("click",function(){e.closest(".visionary-team_popup-wrapper").classList.add("hide")})}),t.forEach(e=>{e.addEventListener("click",function(){let s=e.getAttribute("trigger-popup-slug");document.querySelector('[popup-slug="'+s+'"]').classList.remove("hide")})})}};var E=()=>{let c=document.querySelectorAll(".coming-soon");if(c.length){let t=new Array;c.forEach(o=>{if(window.getComputedStyle(o).display!="none"){let e=o.parentNode;t.push(e)}}),t.forEach(o=>{let e=o.querySelector(".coming-soon"),s=e.textContent,n=o.offsetWidth,i="Coming soon";o.addEventListener("mouseenter",function(){e.textContent=i,n!="0"}),o.addEventListener("mouseleave",function(){setTimeout(function(){e.textContent=s},1e3)})})}};var k=()=>{let c=document.querySelectorAll(".button.is-download-open-trigger");if(c.length){let t=document.querySelector(".download-form-popup"),o=document.querySelector("form"),e=document.querySelector(".popup-close-button"),s=document.querySelector(".download-form-popup-bg"),n=document.querySelector(".button.success-download");e.addEventListener("click",function(){t.classList.add("hide")}),s.addEventListener("click",function(){t.classList.add("hide")}),o.addEventListener("submit",function(){localStorage.setItem("userAuthorized","true"),document.querySelector(".download-file-link").click()}),c.forEach(i=>{i.addEventListener("click",function(){localStorage.getItem("userAuthorized")==="true"?document.querySelector(".download-file-link").click():t.classList.remove("hide")})})}};var v=()=>{let c=document.querySelectorAll("[data-url]");c.length&&c.forEach(t=>{let o=window.location.href;t.setAttribute("data-url",o)})};var C=()=>{if(!document.querySelectorAll(".swiper-slide.is-swiper-testimonials").length){let t=document.querySelector(".section_testimonials-swiper");t&&t.classList.add("hide")}};var A=()=>{document.querySelector(".form-cta_form-block")&&window.location.hash&&document.querySelectorAll(".input-wrapper.is-product-list input").forEach(o=>{let e=o.getAttribute("id");if(e="#"+e,e===window.location.hash){let s=o.closest(".dropdotwn-options_field");setTimeout(function(){s.click()},500)}})};var L=()=>{let c=document.querySelectorAll(".checkbox-wrapper label");c.length&&c.forEach(t=>{function o(n){return n.replace(/<[^>]*>/g,"")}let e=t.textContent;e=e.toString();let s=o(e);t.textContent=s})};var b=()=>{let c=document.querySelectorAll("[request-call-popup-trigger]");c.length&&c.forEach(t=>{t.addEventListener("click",function(){document.querySelector("[request-form-popup]").classList.remove("hide")})}),document.querySelector(".popup-close-button").addEventListener("click",function(){document.querySelector("[request-form-popup]").classList.add("hide")})};var x=()=>{let c=document.querySelector("[password-form]");c&&(c.classList.remove("hide"),document.querySelector("[password-form-append-waiter]").appendChild(c))};window.Webflow||(window.Webflow=[]);window.Webflow.push(()=>{x(),b(),L(),A(),y(),f(),C(),h(),q(),g(),S(),w(),E(),k(),v()});})();
